dcterms:description: The PFL-DocVQA dataset is designed to perform DocVQA in a federated learning and differential privacy set-up. It comprises invoice document images along with their OCR transcriptions and a set of question/answer pairs. The dataset aims to address privacy leakage issues in a realistic scenario, focusing on the sensitive information related to the invoices’ provider.
dcterms:title: PFL-DocVQA

dcterms:description: The DocILE dataset comprises 939,147 real business documents from public data sources, out of which 6,680 are annotated with key-value pairs. It is designed for Key Information Localization and Extraction (KILE).
dcterms:title: DocILE

dcterms:creator: Minesh Mathew
Dimosthenis Karatzas
CV Jawahar
dcterms:description: Single Page DocVQA (SP-DocVQA) is a dataset for visual question answering on document images, focusing on single-page documents.
dcterms:title: Single Page DocVQA (SP-DocVQA)

dcterms:creator: Colin Raffel
dcterms:description: C4 is a dataset exploring the limits of transfer learning with a unified text-to-text transformer, focusing on various text-based tasks.
dcterms:title: C4
